Plot: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole.
Title: Fred Claus
Writer: Dan Fogelman (screenplay), Jessie Nelson (story), Dan Fogelman (story)
Actors: Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, John Michael Higgins, Miranda Richardson
tomatoConsensus: A slew of talent is wasted in this contrived and overly sentimental Christmas film, which can't quite get the balance between slapstick humor and schmaltzy uplift.
